detaileddescription.para: Compile a list of specified dynamic predicates (see dynamic/1 and assert/1 into normal static predicates This call tells the Prolog environment the definition will not change anymore and further calls to assert/1 or retract/1 on the named predicates raise a permission error This predicate is designed to deal with parts of the program that is generated at runtime but does not change during the remainder of the program execution
